ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(GBLite__Original_Record_Id__c))), ISCHANGED(GBLite__Original_Record_Id__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Action"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Custom Code - Global CSS"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Custom Code - Global JavaScript"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Custom Code - CSS"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Custom Code - JavaScript"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Theme - Global"), ISPICKVAL(GBLite__Type__c, "Theme - Grid") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the Original Record Id field.
